dogBreeds.name: Bulldog
dogBreeds.description: Bulldogs often suffer from breathing problems due to their short snouts.

dogBreeds.name: Pug
dogBreeds.description: Pugs are prone to various health issues, including breathing difficulties and eye problems.

dogBreeds.name: German Shepherd
dogBreeds.description: German Shepherds may suffer from hip dysplasia and other genetic disorders.

dogBreeds.name: Golden Retriever
dogBreeds.description: Golden Retrievers are susceptible to certain cancers and hip dysplasia.

dogBreeds.name: Chihuahua
dogBreeds.description: Chihuahuas can suffer from dental problems and hypoglycemia.
